basic.name: Spectral Scythe (Q)
basic.description: Summon a scythe that travels to Xul after 1 second, dealing 190 damage to enemies and spawning a Skeletal Warrior when hitting enemy Heroes.  These do not count towards Xul's Raise Skeleton maximum.

basic.name: Cursed Strikes (W)
basic.description: Xul's Basic Attacks deal damage in a wide area and reduce the Attack Speed of Heroes and Summons by 40% for 2 seconds. Lasts 4 seconds once triggered.{highlight} Hitting enemy units reduce the cooldown by 0.2 seconds, up to 12 seconds. This bonus is increased to 1 second on enemy heroes.{/highlight}

basic.name: Bone Prison (E)
basic.description: After a 2 second delay, deal 80 damage and Root the target enemy Hero for 1.75 seconds.  All nearby Skeletal Warriors will fixate on the target for their duration.

basic.name: Bone Armor (?)
basic.description: Activate to gain a Shield equal to 25% of Xul's maximum Health for 3 seconds.

heroic.name: Poison Nova (R)
heroic.description: After 0.5 seconds, release poisonous missiles that deal 630 damage to all enemies hit over 10 seconds.

heroic.name: Skeletal Mages (R)
heroic.description: Vector TargetingSummon 4 Frost Mages in a line that attack nearby enemies for 47 damage a second and Slow them by 30% for 2 seconds. Last up to 15 seconds.

trait.name: Raise Skeleton (T)
trait.description: When a nearby enemy Minion dies, it becomes a Skeletal Warrior with 240 Health that attacks for 21 damage and lasts up to 12 seconds. Upon death, Skeletal Warriors deal 40 damage to nearby enemies.  Up to 3 Skeletal Warriors can be active at once when spawned in this way.{highlight} Quest: Spawn 80 Skeletal Warriors. Reward: While fixating on an enemy, Skeletal Warriors gain 25% Movement and Attack Speed.{/highlight}

1.name: Backlash
1.description: When Bone Armor expires, nearby enemy Heroes take damage equal to 12% of their maximum Health.

1.name: Shackler
1.description: While Bone Armor is active, nearby enemies are Slowed by 35% for 1 second. Basic Attacks against Heroes that are Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed reduce the cooldown of Bone Armor by 2 seconds.

1.name: Shade
1.description: While Bone Armor is active, Xul evades all Basic Attacks, but increases the cooldown of Bone Armor by 10 seconds.

4.name: Skeleton Champion
4.description: {highlight}Combine close Skeletal Warriors summons into a single, powerful unit. Each skeleton increases the unit's stats by 50%, extends duration, and stacks on-hit effects.{/highlight}

4.name: Trag'Oul's Essence
4.description: Every time a Skeletal Warrior attacks an enemy, restore 0.5% of Xul's maximum Health and 0.2% of his maximum Mana.

4.name: Jailors
4.description: Bone Prison spawns 2 Skeletal Warriors. These do not count towards Xul's Raise Skeleton maximum. {highlight}Skeletal warrior hits against enemy heroes slow them by 5% for 3 seconds stacking up to 6 times{/highlight}

7.name: Harvest Vitality
7.description: Cursed Strikes heals for 70% of the damage dealt to Heroes.
passives: {highlight}Every time Xul is healed he receives 2.5% attack speed for 3 seconds up to 75%{/highlight}

7.name: Dim Vision
7.description: {highlight}Bone Prison reduces the target's vision radius by 25% and restricts them to their own vision only for 2.0 seconds.{/highlight}

7.name: Wall Of Bones
7.description: Increase the Shield amount of Bone Armor to 35% of Xul's maximum Health, and Xul gains 20 Spell Armor for its duration.

10.name: Poison Nova
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, release poisonous missiles that deal 630 damage to all enemies hit over 10 seconds.

10.name: Skeletal Mages
10.description: Vector TargetingSummon 4 Frost Mages in a line that attack nearby enemies for 47 damage a second and Slow them by 30% for 2 seconds. Last up to 15 seconds.

13.name: Echoes of Death
13.description: Spectral Scythe spawns 2 additional scythes next to the first after 1.5 seconds, dealing 40% damage.
passives: {highlight}Reduces Spectral Scythe cooldown by 2 seconds and mana cost by 15{/highlight}

13.name: Decrepify
13.description: {highlight}Enemy Heroes that are damage by Spectral Scythe have their physical armor reduced by 40 for 3 seconds.{/highlight}

13.name: Mortal Wound
13.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Spectral Scythe receive {highlight}50%{/highlight} less healing for 4 seconds.

16.name: Weaken
16.description: Enemy Heroes who are damaged by Cursed Strikes or Skeletal Warriors deal 35% less damage for 3 seconds.

16.name: Bone Spear
16.description: Deal 230 damage to enemies in a line. {highlight}Hitting an enemy hero currently affected by Bone Prison will destroy Bone Spear reducing the target armor by 25 for 2 seconds and rooting close heroes for 1 second.{/highlight}

20.name: Andariel's Visage
20.description: Poison Nova heals for 50% of the damage dealt and its duration is increased by 50%.

20.name: Cold Hand of Death
20.description: Increase the Slow of Frost Mages by {highlight}10%{/highlight}. Every 5th Spectral Scythe that hits enemy Heroes spawns a Frost Mage instead of a Skeletal Warrior at their location.
passives: {highlight}Receive the other two level 13 talents you didn't pick with 50% efficiency.{/highlight}

20.name: Rathma dominion
20.description: {highlight}Xul creates an area that controls life that lasts 10 seconds. Every allied hero that dies within this area will be reanimated restoring 100% of their maximum health but losing 6.25% of their maximum health every 0.25 seconds while on reanimated state.{/highlight}

20.name: Kalan's Edict
20.description: Each time Skeletal Warriors deal damage, reduce the cooldown of Bone Armor and Xul's Heroic Ability by 1.5%.
